song_name: New Wave Bossa Nova - Zelda Majora's Mask
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, New Wave Bossa Nova - Zelda Majora's Mask is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
New Wave Bossa Nova - Zelda Majora's Mask is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
